description: The installation of a second Domain Controller (DC) in an environment where a physical box is running Windows Server 2012 R2 Essentials may lead to multiple operational issues. This includes conflicts in Active Directory replication and potential difficulties in configuration due to the OEM Essentials install. Such conflicts can impede tasks like user authentication and policy application. Administrators may notice degraded performance or failure of administrative tools necessary for managing the domain. Users may also experience access issues as a result of these configuration challenges.
